mapper.select:
select wd.* from wms_distribution wd left join wms_car wc on wc.id = wd.car_id and wc.del_flag = '0' left join wms_car wc2 on wc2.id = wd.car_id_transfer and wc2.del_flag = '0' where wd.del_flag = '0'
and ((wc.license_plate_number = #{carNo})or(wc2.license_plate_number = #{carNo}))
and find_in_set(wd.sstatus,#{status})>0
order by wd.billdate desc

select * from wms_distribution where del_flag = '0'
and ((consignee_iphone = #{iphone})or(consignor_iphone = #{iphone}))
and find_in_set(sstatus,#{status})>0
order by billdate desc
